title: pixel 2xl croma store se liya tha dec 10 2018 ko call quality pehle din se hi kharab h
content: pixel 2xl call quality bekar h pehle din se hi b2x service center me bhi dene se darr lagta h reviews dekhne k baad after sales serivce pe bharosa nhi h google walo ki aesehi chalana padd rha h phono ko
